name: Treff Alpenhotel Kronprinz Berchtesgaden

reviews.title: Enjoyable hotel up the hill from center town
reviews.text: I suppose this would be considered a large resort hotel, maybe 4 out of 5 stars. It is a bit pricey, but not too bad.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed there some 3 yrs ago. Problem is the hotel closes the door/check-in desk at 22:00 and I arrived there at 21:50. Lucky me, or else I would have needed to sleep in the car outside. The restaurant also closes about that time, but I was able to eat at the bar. The closing time was not advised to me when I made the booking, and that is why I took off 1 star.
reviews.title: Terrible room, smelling of smoke, with view straight into a tree/bush

reviews.text: Hotel is on a street up the hill from the castle and center town. While that is a bit of a pain in the neck, it does give one an opportunity to walk a bit around this picturesque town. Room seemed to be big, with red leather sofa. While the hotel has a view towards the mountains, my room did not have any view to speak of, but none was promised either in the Expedia reservation. Breakfast buffet was fine too, though the dinner menu did not impress me, so I ended having dinner at other places.
reviews.title: okay hotel in stunning scenery

likes.liked: — the view of the mountains was stunning!
likes.disliked: — breakfast service and phone in room didn't work and was never fixed.

reviews.text: I visited this hotel with my family when I was younger, and we thought it would be nice to experience this hotel again. The experience turned out to be different than the first time. The room smelled of sigarettes, we couldn't hang any of of clothes in the cabinet because of the smell. The room had absolutely no view, we looked straight into a tree/bush. The bathroom was freezing cold, so the towels I used on the night before at around 6 pm, was really wet the next morning at 11 am.
reviews.title: Solid Performer with a Gorgeous View
Wonderful! Fantastic View! Great hotel!
reviews.text: the hotel itself was a bit hard to find, being located on top of a hill. the decor is bavarian but a bit old fashioned.

aka: Treff Alpenhotel Kronprinz Berchtesgaden Hotel Berchtesgaden
